Description:
Detects DNS query requests to Devtunnels domains. Attackers can abuse that feature to establish a reverse shell or persistence on a machine.


Author: citron_ninja
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Query To Devtunnels Domain
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where query_name like '%.devtunnels.ms'
